row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SANITY_CHECK :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES
! Check WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory :IF &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = '' : SET &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = "$UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH" :ENDIF
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode ! :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.DEFINE_WSADMIN@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#, '\', '/') :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#, '\', '/')
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ROLLBACK.BACKUP_VHOST
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
PATH=$PATH:&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#;export PATH
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#, '\', '/') :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#, '\', '/')
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.DEFINE_WSADMIN@UNIX
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ROLLBACK.BACKUP_VHOST
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.post_process:
:SET &value# = "" :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.VARA.TEMP.DELETE_VHOST_BACKUP" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"RESULT: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#," = ") : SET &pos# = &pos# + 9 : SET &value# = MID(&line#, &pos#) :ENDPROCESS
:IF &value# <> "" :PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&BACKUPKEY#", "&value#" :ENDIF
